title: Vehicle Classification â€“ What?

intro.question: What kind of vehicle is this?
intro.explanation: In this step, you choose the main function of the vehicle. You do not need the exact name yet. There are only three possible answers.

categories.label: Combat vehicle

description.a2: A combat vehicle is made to fight the enemy.
description.b1: A combat vehicle is designed to fight the enemy using weapons and armour.

example_sentences: It is used to fight the enemy.

categories.label: Manoeuvre / Transport vehicle

description.a2: This vehicle moves soldiers or units.
description.b1: This vehicle is used to transport soldiers or perform reconnaissance.

example_sentences: It is used to transport soldiers.

description.b1: This vehicle supports other units and vehicles during operations.

rules: This step is not about the exact vehicle type.
First choose the category, then name the vehicle in the next step.
If you are not sure, choose Support vehicle and explain why.
summary: Combat vehicles fight. Manoeuvre vehicles move. Support vehicles help.
